articles.content: Virat Kohli's maiden T20I hundred came at the top of the order in the recently-concluded Asia Cup, and reignited the debate on who should open for India at the upcoming T20 WC. India captain Rohit Sh… [+4001 chars]

articles.description: Kohli's return to form while opening the innings reignited debate whether he should be preferred over KL Rahul, who saw a mediocre T20 Asia Cup as he managed just 132 runs from five innings. | Cricket
